name: @raydeck/serverless-console
description: Open the AWS Cloudformation Console for current serverless stack

scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --readme none --mode file --excludeNotExported --includeVersion --out docstemp && commanderdoc markdown lib/bin.js -o docstemp/__cli.md --cli-name serverless-console && rm README.md ; mv docstemp/README.md docstemp/library.md ; concat-md docstemp > README.md && rm -rf docstemp
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn build && yarn docs && git commit README.md -m "docs: updating docs" ; git push ; echo "Done with prepublish"

author: Ray Deck
